ghost

Class Waka

  • java.lang.Object
    • ghost.Entity
      • ghost.Waka

  • public class Waka
extends Entity
    An extension of entity that stores all information and mechanics of the waka.

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from class ghost.Entity

        direction, map, nextDirection, sprite, x, y

      Checks if the waka is currently colliding with a ghost.

      Gets the Waka's current location (in terms of the List of List of cells) and calls collectfruit with these coordinates.

      A getter for the image of the waka with a closed mouth.

      A setter for whether the Waka's mouth is currently open.
      void tick(App app)
      Toggles whether the mouth is open every 8 frames, checks if moving forward in the current direciton would collide with a wall, if the waka can turn to it's next direciton, checks for collisions with ghosts, collects any fruit and moves the waka forward.

      • collectFruit

        public void collectFruit(App app)
        Gets the Waka's current location (in terms of the List of List of cells) and calls collectfruit with these coordinates.

      • checkWakaGhostCollision

        public boolean checkWakaGhostCollision(App app)
        Checks if the waka is currently colliding with a ghost. If a collision is occuring, decrements the waka's lives and sends all entities back to their original position.
        Parameters:
        app -
        Returns:
        boolean, whether there has been a collision.

      • tick

        public void tick(App app)
        Toggles whether the mouth is open every 8 frames, checks if moving forward in the current direciton would collide with a wall, if the waka can turn to it's next direciton, checks for collisions with ghosts, collects any fruit and moves the waka forward.
        Parameters:
        app -

        public void draw(App app)
